meanings.definition: Make (a substance) soluble, especially by the action of a solvent.
meanings.sent1: I solubilised the sugar in water to make a sweet solution.
meanings.sent2: The salt solubilised quickly in the warm water.
meanings.sent3: The clever scientist solubilised the mystery powder in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness solubilised the tension in the room, making everyone relax.
meanings.sent5: The magic potion solubilised the curse, bringing peace to the kingdom.
